author: Staff Reporter
text:
Advocates affiliated to the Madras High Court Advocates Association (MHAA) and the Women Lawyers Association (WLA), on Friday, boycotted all the court proceedings and observed the day as ‘black day’ for the alleged inaction against police officials involved in the attack against lawyers inside the high court premises seven years ago.

The protesting advocates demanded that the case in connection with the clash which is pending before the Supreme Court should be disposed of expeditiously and due action should be taken against the police officials responsible for the offence.

On February 19, 2009 a clash between police and advocates occurred.

Lawyers demand that SC disposes of cases relating to the 2009 attack and action be taken
title: Advocates observe ‘black day’
